name: market for batch dyeing, fibre, cotton | batch dyeing, fibre, cotton | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20253/documentation

This is a market activity. In the case of services or immobile infrastructures, markets are connecting suppliers and consumers at a global level. For specific connections at regional level, direct links between the local producing activities and the local consumers are preferred. Transport or losses are logically not relevant for this type of products.;This is the market for  'batch dyeing, fibre, cotton', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is delivering the service of 'batch dyeing, fibre, cotton' and includes all necessary materials, energy, water, wastewater (produced within the process) and infrastructure in order to process 1 kg of fibre. Batch dyeing is a process that applies a uniform and desired colour on the material that is applied. A user should use this service alongside 1 kg of cotton fibre of their choice.

This activity starts at the site that 'batch dyeing, fabric' is offered as service within the geography of this dataset.

This activity ends with the supply of 1 kg of 'batch dyeing, fibre' to the consumers of this product. Transport is not taken into account. No losses in service considered.
